pages.text: Compasses will now function in both the Nether and the End.$(li)When used in the Nether, a compass will point to the portal you came in from. Note that you must have the compass on you when you $(italic)enter$() the Nether.$(li)When used in the End, it'll point to the return portal to the Overworld.
Furthermore, both Compasses and Clocks no longer function unless they are crafted.$(br2)Say goodbye to looking through your guides for directions.

Additionally, you may craft a new type of compass - the $(item)Beacon Compass$(). As the name implies, right clicking it onto a beacon will make it point towards where it stands. You can also dye it any color you wish.
